taxonomicnotes: Danio (Brachydanio) tweediei Brittan, 1956, from Kedah State, Peninsular Malaysia is an uncertain synonym of this species. If confirmed, this would extend the southward range of the species. Danio albolineatus (Blyth 1860) was shown to be a synonym this species by Fang (2001).
rationale: The species is a locally common fish with a wide distribution. Its populations have not declined, and it is assesses as Least Concern.
